title: League of Legends patcher failing to download the game
body:
Downloading LoL for the first time here, I get to about 80%, which takes like an hour. I have roughly 20 Mbps dl, sometimes the LoL patcher goes down to like 50 kbps, (ive literally seen it go down to 0 kbps, what the fuck) and then around the 80% mark when it applies patches, it fails and resets the whole fucking process from 33%, why is it doing this and what can I do to fix it. Ive turned off peer to peer connection and it still happens.

Also when I exit the launcher it brings up the error report window.

replies.body:
Failure at this point during the patching process indicates that your patcher is unable to maintain a solid connection to our patching servers. This could be for a number of reasons, however, our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if this resolved the patching error for you.
